backend/main.mo: Main actor defining the labor booking platform backend with types for Availability, Booking, Service, and Laborer, plus functions for managing laborer profiles, bookings, and user profiles with role-based access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two debugging features related to fixing the 'labour not found' error in CreateBookingPage.tsx by investigating laborer data fetching and adding comprehensive error logging.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing their purpose, key functionality, and implementation details for the labor booking application.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles defining OKLCH color system variables for light and dark modes with warm earth-tone palette (amber, orange, stone) and base styling for body and border elements.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component configuring TanStack Router with all route definitions (landing, profile, discovery, booking pages), Layout wrapper with ProfileSetupModal for new users, and Toaster for notifications.
frontend/src/components/BookingHistorySe: Collapsible section component displaying completed and cancelled bookings with toggle functionality, status badges, formatted dates, and clickable cards linking to booking detail pages.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout component with responsive header navigation, Internet Identity authentication button, mobile menu toggle, and footer with LaborConnect branding and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal component that prompts new users to enter their name on first login, using a form with name input and submit button that calls useSaveCallerUserProfile mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with authentication, initializing access control with admin token and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookingFilters.ts: Hook providing a filterAndSortBookings function that filters bookings by status and sorts them by date (newest or oldest).
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and providing login/logout functions with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, laborer data, and bookings from the backend actor, with automatic cache invalidation on mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark theme colors including primary, secondary, accent, and sidebar color schemes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the root component wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider for state management and authentication.
frontend/src/pages/BookingDetailPage.tsx: Page displaying detailed booking information with editable details field for providers, showing requester/provider profiles, status badges, and formatted date/time information.
frontend/src/pages/BookingsDashboard.tsx: Dashboard page displaying incoming and outgoing bookings with filtering, sorting, and status management. Shows active bookings and history in tabs with detailed booking cards.
frontend/src/pages/BookingSuccessPage.ts: Success confirmation page shown after booking submission with links to discover more laborers or view bookings dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/CreateBookingPage.tsx: Form page for creating new bookings with a specific laborer. Validates input fields (service type, date/time, duration, location) and submits booking requests.
frontend/src/pages/DiscoveryPage.tsx: Search page for finding laborers by location. Displays laborer cards with availability status, skills, and booking options.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Marketing homepage with hero section and features overview. Shows authentication-aware CTAs for finding laborers or managing profile.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Profile management page for laborers to edit their information including name, skills, services, location, contact, and availability status.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration for parameter persistence across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes using OKLCH color space, extended theme settings for borders/radius/shadows, custom animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata for a peer-to-peer labor booking marketplace app, tracking implemented features (authentication, profiles, discovery, bookings, detailed views) and noting a known issue where the booking page displays 'labour not found' error.
